version_description: We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens.

Hey, hey. Here's the latest from HT HQ:
• Better support for iOS11 and iPhone X
• Made it easier and clearer to redeem coupons and to book for someone else
• If you haven't heard, you can now book up to 100 days in advance in some of our most popular locations!

As always, if you've got any feedback you're itchin' to share, hit us up at feedback@hoteltonight.com.

Here's what's new:
• Retooled our bookings tab to make your current booking pop (don't have a current booking? get on that!)
• If you haven't heard, you can now book up to 100 days in advance in some of our most popular locations!

Here's what's new & different:
• Made it even easier to switch between map view and the hotel list when you're choosing which awesome hotel to stay at next. Give it a swipe!
• Some polish and tweaks to make everything work seamlessly for you iPhone X early adopters
We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens.
We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens.

• Great news! We’ve revamped HT Perks to make it even cooler and more valuable to you.
• How HT Perks works: As you book, you unlock levels that score you access to extra discounts and benefits.
• As always, the more you book, the better the deals get. And there’s now no limit to the number of levels you can hit.
• We've also added "Save for Later" – use your Geo Rate or HT Perks discount when you book, or save it for a sunny day (aka a future booking).
• So update the app to get on our level.

• As always, the more you book, the better the deals get. And there’s now no limit to the number of levels you can hit.
• We've also added "Save for Later" – use your Geo Rate or HT Perks discount when you book, or save it for a sunny day (aka a future booking).
• So update the app to get on our level.

We update the app pretty regularly to keep things running smoothly. Occasionally we'll update with something really exciting. We promise to tell you when that happens.

Well, hey. Come here often?
Here's what we've been up to of late:

• You can now "watch" a search to stay in-the-know about upcoming pricing changes and deals.
• Plus, we now make it even easier to see how much money you're saving (#discountsondiscounts) and tell you how prices have changed since the last time you looked.
• Got feedback or just want to tell us how much you looove the app? Shoot it on over to feedback@hoteltonight.com

We’ve added new features to make your booking experience easier!
• We’re ready for iOS 12!
• New for iOS 12, use Siri Shortcuts to quickly view your upcoming booking.
• Want to share that sweet deal with someone? You can now access the share menu from the hotel page

• Daily Drop is here! Unlock a mystery deal of the day for an extra sweet price. Book quickly, rates disappear in 15 minutes.
• Lock down multiple rooms in a single booking! Alert the group chat. Did someone say Vegas?
• We’ve made it to Asia and Latin America! Book now in Tokyo, Singapore, Tulum, and more select cities.

In the latest update, we've made performance improvements and fixed some issues, to make it even easier and more fun to book a place to stay on HotelTonight. Plan Less. Live More!

HotelTonight Local Getaways Widget is now live!
Discover Local Getaways at a glance with our new HotelTonight Widget. Unlock the best deals nearby for a spontaneous adventure.

Additionally, in this latest update, we've made performance improvements and fixed some issues, to make it even easier and more fun to book a place to stay on HotelTonight. Plan Less. Live More!
